name: Resurva
overview:
Resurva is a management platform for booking based businesses that eliminates administrative distractions while letting clients book anytime, anywhere.

Resurva empowers a business to invest more time into the things that matter: improving client engagement, service execution and building its brand and culture.

Ask small business owners about their most time consuming daily distractions they’ll likely talk about interruptions like answering the phone, responding to emails, scheduling staff and managing customer accounts. These inevitable interruptions of running a business prevent time from being invested into what matters most for the client - the experience.

From an operations point of view, successfully diverting time spent on managing daily distractions and administration is also the difference between a business thriving or merely surviving month to month. Unfortunately, knowing and having the means to eliminate distractions are often not at hand for most small businesses.

The team at Resurva knew there had to be a better way after seeing some of their favorite spots struggle between running the business and the focus required to provide exceptional services. This was all the encouragement James and company needed to build Resurva.

Resurva is perfect for barber barber shops, salons, yoga studios, gyms and conference centres – really, it’s for any business that offers client based services and values culture and brand.

By reducing time spent on maintenance, Resurva empowers a business to invest more time into the things that matter like managing clients, service execution and building the business’ brand and culture.

Resurva is simple, elegant and cost effective. It’s easy to try, buy, set up and use. Clients will love the usability and the elimination of barriers to book appointments anytime, anywhere. Staff will love the client management, sales tracking, real time business analytics, credit and package management, and so much more.

Resurva - It starts with the booking.
